forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plenty of sunshine. High 17C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 63F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally clear. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 56F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: More clouds than sun. High 16C. E winds shifting to SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High near 60F. E winds shifting to SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 55F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 18C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High near 65F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low around 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 17C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 18C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 64F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
